mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.anpailiebiao_name as anpailiebiaoName ,a.anpailiebiao_types as anpailiebiaoTypes ,a.anpailiebiao_content as anpailiebiaoContent ,a.kaishi_time as kaishiTime ,a.jieshu_time as jieshuTime ,a.fenzhong as fenzhong ,a.wancheng_types as wanchengTypes ,a.zhuangtai_types as zhuangtaiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM anpailiebiao a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.anpailiebiao_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.anpailiebiaoName},'%')
and a.anpailiebiao_types = #{params.anpailiebiaoTypes}
and a.anpailiebiao_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.anpailiebiaoContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaishiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jieshu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jieshuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jieshu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jieshuTimeEnd})
and a.fenzhong >= #{params.fenzhongStart}
and a.fenzhong <= #{params.fenzhongEnd}
and a.fenzhong = #{params.fenzhong}
and a.wancheng_types = #{params.wanchengTypes}
and a.zhuangtai_types = #{params.zhuangtaiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
